flow_rate.description: Volumetric design flow rate. Value specified will be either the system or per-borehole flow rate depending on the 'flow_type' set.

flow_type.description: Indicates whether the design volumetric flow rate set on on a per-borehole or system basis.

max_eft.description: Maximum heat pump entering fluid temperature.

min_eft.description: Minimum heat pump entering fluid temperature.
